title: Image Editor
content: A tool for creating and editing pixel art graphics tailored for Playdate games. Allows you to import and export images, apply filters, and manage layers efficiently.

title: Sound Studio
content: An audio editing environment designed to create custom sound effects and music tracks for Playdate games. Supports multiple audio formats and provides advanced mixing tools.

title: Level Designer
content: A drag-and-drop tool for designing game levels with pre-built assets and custom logic blocks. Includes testing and preview features to see how levels interact in real time.
